p: Analgesic effect of fruit extract (ZAF) and crude alkaloids (ZAFA) was evaluated by performing the tail-flick test and was compared with the effect of the standard drug (tramadol). The effect of ZAF and ZAFA was significant (p < 0.05 and p < 0.001) and was more pronounced in case of crude alkaloids as compared with standard drug Tramadol. It showed that crude alkaloids have the ability to reduce the pain in mice.
